hiveArticle.title: Don't Give Up and Don't Give In
hiveArticle.body:
###### <center>This post is a Motivational post to all the folks out here on Steemit. </center>
<hr>

There are numerous instances in our life that we think that we are not going anywhere with our career, our relationships were not great, our health should be better. These thoughts are actually creating a negative atmosphere around you. In this fast-moving world, everyone wants a quick solution to every problem. Everyone wants to be rich and that too instant without doing any hard work. And if someone does not get it, they think that they are not capable of doing it.

Let me tell you a story

Have you seen a Chinese bamboo tree, it looks like something below.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZSmBV2jcn6D7qdnxud5G17DYv3wVJPEjA9gcgeSJ92dF/image.png)
PC : [Pixabay](https://pixabay.com/en/bamboo-forest-nature-green-natural-1886974/)

To grow one you have to follow a strict rule, in which you have to water it every single day for 5 years. Yes 5 Years, if you fail any single day the tree will die. Now after 5 years staying below the ground, this tree will climb up to 90 feet in another 2 months. 

The moral of this story is simple, have patience. You can also read my previous post on [Patience is the Key to Success](https://steemit.com/life/@codingdefined/lets-discuss-patience-is-the-key-to-success). 

Now coming back to the post if you think you are getting a lot of Negative thoughts and you want to forget it completely. To disappoint you, I must say that there is nothing which can completely make you forget those thoughts and you should also don't indulge yourself in things that will help you forgot things for a shorter time. I have a better alternatives, start doing any of these things :)

- Read a book.
- Watch an inspirational video.
- Watch a ted talk.
- Help Someone with something.
- Exercise
- Or whatever you feel like which will keep you happy

These things not only change your mood but also give you a feeling of empowerment because a small positive momentum will help you to move towards positive direction. This positive momentum can do wonders, they can take you places which you wouldn't have think of. Just start a baby step towards positive direction and Don't give up / Don't give in. Where there's a will, there's a way

<hr>
